meanings.definition: A monosaccharide sugar containing five carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: I learned in science class that a pentose is a sugar with five carbon atoms.
meanings.sent2: The body can break down a pentose sugar to provide energy for cells.
meanings.sent3: The pentose sugar went to a party and made all the other sugars jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a pentose sugar on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The pentose sugar molecule danced gracefully under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of sugars containing five carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: My favorite type of sugar to bake with is a pentose.
meanings.sent2: Nutritious fruits often contain a pentose among other sugars.
meanings.sent3: The pentose sugar in the recipe added a special touch to the dessert.
meanings.sent4: His words were as comforting as a pentose sugar in a warm drink.
meanings.sent5: The pentose sugar sparkled like a gem in the sunlight.
